title: Video Games
author: Lana Del Rey
lyrics:
[00:23.12] Swinging in the backyard
[00:25.23] Pull up in your fast car
[00:27.24] Whistling my name
[00:31.33] Open up a beer
[00:33.09] And you say, "Get over here
[00:34.79] And play a video game"
[00:39.09] I'm in his favourite sundress
[00:40.96] Watchin' me get undressed
[00:43.06] Take that body downtown
[00:46.63] I say, "You the bestest"
[00:48.84] Lean in for a big kiss
[00:50.84] Put his favourite perfume on
[00:54.02] Go play your video game
[00:58.47] It's you, it's you, it's all for you
[01:02.38] Everything I do
[01:05.21] I tell you all the time
[01:07.34] Heaven is a place on earth with you
[01:11.00] Tell me all the things you wanna do
[01:15.17] I heard that you like the bad girls
[01:18.27] Honey, is that true?
[01:23.07] It's better than I ever even knew
[01:26.87] They say that the world was built for two
[01:31.03] Only worth living if somebody is loving you
[01:39.90] And, baby, now you do
[01:43.83] 
[01:49.13] Singin' in the old bars
[01:51.30] Swingin' with the old stars
[01:53.42] Livin' for the fame
[01:57.03] Kissin' in the blue dark
[01:59.24] Playin' pool and wild darts
[02:01.34] Video games
[02:04.71] He holds me in his big arms
[02:07.06] Drunk and I am seeing stars
[02:09.29] This is all I think of
[02:13.06] Watchin' all our friends fall

[02:48.96] It's better than I ever even knew
[02:53.05] They say that the world was built for two
[02:56.94] Only worth living if somebody is loving you
[03:06.00] And, baby, now you do

[03:10.71] (Now you do)
[03:12.97] (Now you do)
